data.name: Your Personal Coffee Shop
data.detailed_description:
Collect in-game coins, purchase furniture, wallpapers, lamps, decorative elements, etc. and work or relax while listening to our medidative music written by awesome composers and even AI. Perfect for relaxing after work or the beginning of a well-productive working day and also for those who like to design and customize their own apartments.

Build your apartment

What's in the game:

  • Idle and relaxing gameplay
  • Day & Night cycle
  • Cozy atmosphere with meditative soundtrack
  • Dozens of furniture elements to customize your apartments as you want[/]
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Your Personal Chill Apartment is a relaxing music indie game with designing and customizing your personal apartment elements.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista / 7
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® III or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB or higher
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB or higher
